nodes.text: A male Talz was the only son of Captain Armaruk. Both were the members of the Talz Commandos and assisted the Galactic Republic on Hoth during the Galactic War with the Sith Empire. He was killed by the local wildlife around 3642 BBY.
Armaruk's son is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic in the Republic mission "The Lost Patrol" on Hoth.
